review: Couldn't be happier with my amazon fire stick. It is easy to use and the menu makes it quick and easy to navigate. Plenty of content to watch for the whole family.

review: I had already bought one, and I was so happy with it that I bought this one as a gift. The person who got it is joying it, and wants another one give as a present too.

review: Great product! It has some issues with apps crashing, but nothing persistent. I would give it closer to 4.5 stars, but that's not an option.
author: Mary Woody
